name: test_e2e_with_logs[091_PATH_ENC_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `PATH_ENC_001` |
| **Name** | URL encoded dot-dot-slash |
| **Category** | PATH |
| **Subcategory** | encoded_traversal |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `%2e%2e%2fetc/passwd`
- **Encoded**: `%252e%252e%252fetc%2Fpasswd`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~18000ms
- **Timestamp**: 05:38:10.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX Traversal] Encoded path traversal attack detected test_id=PATH_ENC_001-1766554690285-cu9gt pattern_id=PATH_ENC_001 uri=/?q=%252e%252e%252fetc%2Fpasswd client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
